items.desc: Gain @NumSpatulas@ Spatula and @NumComponents@ random item component(s).
items.name: Urf's Grab Bag II

items.desc: After combat with a player, one or two random Mages portal onto your bench. Gain a Taliyah.
items.name: Mage Conference

items.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Shapeshifter. Gain a Gnar.
items.name: Shapeshifter Heart

items.desc: Scalescorns gain @DamageAmp@% damage each time they start combat in the same hex, stacking up to @MaxStacks@ times. Gain a Lillia.
items.name: Base Camp

items.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Shimmerscale. Gain a Titan's Resolve and a Volibear.
items.name: Shimmerscale Soul

items.desc: Gain a Mirage Emblem and a Nunu.
items.name: Mirage Crest

items.desc: Assassins Mana-Reave the first unit they attack, increasing their maximum Mana by @ManaReavePercent@% until they cast. Assassins deal @DamageAmp@% more damage against Mana-Reaved enemies. Gain a Qiyana.
items.name: Cutthroat

items.desc: When you reach Level @LevelReq@, gain @Gold@ gold.
items.name: Lategame Specialist

items.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Astral. Gain a Redemption and a Varus.
items.name: Astral Soul

items.desc: Gain a 2-star champion and @Gold@ gold every time you level up. The champion's tier is your level minus 4 (min: Tier 1).
items.name: Birthday Present

items.desc: Gain a Guild Emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Twitch.
items.name: Guild Crown

items.desc: Gain a Ragewing Emblem and a Rakan.
items.name: Ragewing Crest

items.desc: Gain a Darkflight Emblem and a Rell.
items.name: Darkflight Crest

items.desc: Evoker's attacks steal @ManaDrainDrain@ Mana from their target. Gain a Seraphine.
items.name: Essence Theft

items.desc: Direct damage items deal @DamageIncPercent*100@% more damage as true damage. Gain a Statikk Shiv.
items.name: Gadget Expert

items.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Ragewing. Gain a Guinsoo's Rageblade and a Rakan.
items.name: Ragewing Soul

items.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Mirage. Gain a Yone.
items.name: Mirage Heart

items.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Dragonmancer. Gain a Kai'Sa.
items.name: Dragonmancer Heart

items.desc: Gain a Guardian Emblem, a Sunfire Cape, and a Rakan.
items.name: Guardian Crown

items.desc: The unit in the center of the board gains @BonusAP@ Ability Power, increased to @FinalAP@ after Tempest's lightning strikes. Gain a Qiyana.
items.name: Eye of the Storm

items.desc: Your units take @DamageReduction@% less damage from enemies shrunken by Whisper champions. Gain a Sylas.
items.name: Terrify

items.desc: Until they cast @CastCount@ times, Lagoon champions attack @ASReductionPct@% slower but gain @Mana@ Mana per second. Gain a Kai'sa.
items.name: High Tide

items.desc: Combat start: Your team gains a @ShieldAmount@ Health shield for every item component equipped on an Astral champion, including those that are part of a full item. Gain a Lux.
items.name: Protectors of the Cosmos

items.desc: Gain a Cannoneer Emblem and an Aphelios.
items.name: Cannoneer Crest

items.desc: Guild champions holding an item gain @Resists@ Armor and an additional @GuildBonusPct@% of their base Guild Bonus. Gain a Twitch.
items.name: Gear Upgrades

items.desc: At the end of combat, champions that started combat adjacent to Bruisers permanently gain @Health@ Health, increased by @BonusHealth@ if they survived. Gain a Olaf.
items.name: Personal Training

items.desc: Units that start combat next to Shapeshifters gain @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed and Movement Speed. Shapeshifters always gain this bonus. Gain a Gnar.
items.name: Beast's Den

items.desc: Gain a Scalescorn Emblem and a Braum.
items.name: Scalescorn Crest

items.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Evoker. Gain a Zyra.
items.name: Evoker Heart

items.desc: Gain a Lagoon Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and a Zeri.

items.desc: Gain an Assassin Emblem and a Qiyana.
items.name: Assassin Crest

items.desc: Buying XP costs @HealthCost@ Health instead of gold. Heal @Heal@ Health each round.

items.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain @HPBonus@ Health, @Stats@ Attack Damage, and @Stats@ Ability Power every round. Stacks up to @MaxStacks@ times.
items.name: Preparation II

items.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Whispers. Gain a Zyra.
items.name: Whispers Heart

items.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain @HPBonus@ Health, @Stats@ Attack Damage, and @Stats@ Ability Power every round. Stacks up to @MaxStacks@ times.
items.name: Preparation III

items.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Jade. Gain a Gnar.
items.name: Jade Heart

items.desc: Gain a Mage Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and a Sylas.
items.name: Mage Crown

items.desc: All healing and shielding on your units is increased by @HealShieldIncrease*100@%.
items.name: First Aid Kit III

items.desc: Gain @Gold@ gold. At the start of every round, champions on the @BenchSlots@ rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost.
items.name: Pandora's Bench

items.desc: All healing and shielding on your units is increased by @HealShieldIncrease*100@%.
items.name: First Aid Kit II

items.desc: Gain a Tempest Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Lee Sin.
items.name: Tempest Crown

items.desc: Gain a random Ornn artifact now and after every @NumberOfCombats@ player combats.
items.name: Living Forge

items.desc: You cannot perform actions for the next @RoundsToSkip@ rounds. Afterwards, gain @Gold@ gold.
items.name: AFK

items.desc: The Dragon trait remains active regardless of how many Dragons you have. Dragons gain @Stats@ Attack Damage and Ability Power. Gain a random Tier 4 Dragon.
items.name: Dragon Horde

items.desc: Every @HealTimer@ seconds, Lagoon champions remove all negative effects on themselves and heal for @MissingHPPercent@% of their missing Health. Gain a Zac.
items.name: Oasis

items.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain @HPBonus@ Health, @Stats@ Attack Damage, and @Stats@ Ability Power every round. Stacks up to @MaxStacks@ times.
items.name: Preparation III

items.desc: Cavalier's first attack after charging deals @BaseDamage@ magic damage, increased by @ResistPercentInc@% for each Armor and Magic Resist they have. Gain a Rell.
items.name: Devastating Charge

items.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Cavalier. Gain a Rell.
items.name: Cavalier Heart

items.desc: Gain an Evoker Emblem and a Zyra.
items.name: Evoker Crest

items.desc: Cannoneer's cannon shots burn their targets, dealing @BurnPct@% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over @BurnDuration@ seconds, and reducing healing by @GrievousWoundsPct@% for the duration of the burn. Gain an Aphelios.
items.name: Hot Shot

items.desc: The Cavalier trait grants its bonuses to all of your champions. This does not increase your number of Cavaliers. Gain a Rell.
items.name: Cavalier Unity

items.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Shimmerscale. Gain a Jax.

items.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain @HPBonus@ Health, @Stats@ Attack Damage, and @Stats@ Ability Power every round. Stacks up to @MaxStacks@ times.
items.name: Preparation I

items.name: Lagoon Crest

items.desc: After casting their first Ability, Ragewings restore @ManaRestorePct@% of their maximum Rage. Gain a Senna.
items.name: Tantrum

items.desc: Gain a Warrior Emblem, a Giant Slayer, and a Yone.
items.name: Warrior Crown

items.desc: You cannot perform actions for the next @RoundsToSkip@ rounds. Afterwards, gain @Gold@ gold.
items.name: AFK

items.desc: Gain a Bruiser Emblem, a Redemption, and a Sylas.
items.name: Bruiser Crown

items.desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain +@HexRangeIncrease@ Attack Range and @AS*100@% Attack Speed.

items.desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain infinite Attack Range and @AS*100@% Attack Speed.
items.name: Scoped Weapons II

items.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Dragon. Gain a Zippy and a Gargoyle Stoneplate.

items.name: Assassin Heart

items.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain @HPBonus@ Health, @Stats@ Attack Damage, and @Stats@ Ability Power every round. Stacks up to @MaxStacks@ times.
items.name: Preparation I

items.name: Preparation I

items.desc: Gain a Swiftshot Emblem, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, and a Varus.
items.name: Swiftshot Crown

items.desc: Jade Statue explosions deal @DamageIncPct@% more damage. Enemies are disarmed for @DisarmDuration@ seconds the first time they attack a Jade Statue or are damaged by a Jade Statue's explosion. Gain a Gnar.
items.name: Penitence

items.desc: Your units that start combat next to a unit with over @RequiredHealth@ Health take @DamageReductionPercent@% less damage for the rest of combat.
items.name: Big Friend I

items.desc: Gain a random component every @Combats@ player combats when you have at least Guild (@TraitLevelReq@) active. Gain a Twitch.

items.desc: After combat with a player, a random Mage portals onto your bench. Gain a Taliyah.
items.name: Mage Conference

items.desc: Gain a Mystic Emblem and a Rakan.
items.name: Mystic Crest

items.desc: Gain a Guardian Emblem and a Zac.
items.name: Guardian Crest

items.desc: Warrior's enhanced attacks deal @SplashDmgPct*100@% of their damage to enemies in a @HexRange@-hex area around their target. Gain a Yone.
items.name: Tiamat

items.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Ragewing. Gain a Guinsoo's Rageblade and a Rakan.
items.name: Ragewing Soul

items.desc: Gain an Astral Emblem and a Lux.

items.desc: Bruisers gain @HealthPercent*100@% of their Health as Attack Damage. Gain a Jax.

items.name: Dragonmancer Crest

items.desc: Gain a Swiftshot Emblem and a Twitch.

items.desc: When one of your Jade champions would die, the nearest Jade Statue protects them, sacrificing @StatueDamagePct@% of its max Health and transferring @PercentHP@% of the sacrificed Health to the champion. Gain a Gnar.
items.name: Eternal Protection

items.desc: The first time you would be eliminated or reduced to 1 Health, instead remain alive. After this effect triggers, your units permanently gain @Health@ Health, @Resists@ Armor and Magic Resist, and @Omnivamp@% Omnivamp.
items.name: Last Stand

items.desc: Gain a Cavalier Emblem, a Redemption, and a Nunu.
